TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Mayl’ux, title = Mayl’ux, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mayl’ux} }

S.FORM: alang Mayl'ux ga niya mki sku Sincik Keng atu Gpho go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 62 buwan, 143 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 89% kyan ku 127 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 11% kyan ku 16 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 72%, saySiyat 12%, Amis 3%, Bunun 1%, Truku 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Mayl'ux hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na Mayl'ux hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Mayl'ux hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Mayl'ux hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Mayl'ux hya' ga Mayhuman. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Mayl'ox ga niya mki sko Sincik Keng ato Gpho go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 62 bowan, 143 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 89% kyan ko 127 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 11% kyan ko 16 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 72%, saySiyat 12%, Amis 3%, Bonon 1%, Troko 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Mayl'ox hya' ga llyong. tay 'zil na Mayl'ox hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Mayl'ox hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Mayl'ox hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Mayl'ox hya' ga Mayhoman. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
